  MGALL_GELL = 0x00000000L, MGTOP_KIND = 0xff000000L, MGMANIFOLD = 0xff00ff00L, MGFSURFACE_KIND = 0xff0fff00L,

Detailed Description

MGGel is top abstract class for MGObject, MGGroup, and MGGLAttrib.

Typedef Documentation

typedef std::pair<MGGEL_KIND,MGGEL_TID> MGAbstractGel

MGAbstractGel is a class to specify what kind of abstract gel group.

Let MGAbstractGel agel(gel_kind, gel_tid), then gel_kind is either MGALL_GELL, MGTOP_KIND, MGMANIFOLD, MGGEO_TOPO, MGGEO_KIND, or MGLEAF_KIND. And gel_tid is the specific type of the gel_kind. For the value of gel_tid, see MGGEL_KIND above. Possible combinations are defined in MGDefault.h(as mgAll_xxxx). See the definition.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum MGGEL_KIND

MGGEL_KIND_TID is used to specify what kind of group is used to identify gels.

Enumerator:
MGALL_GELL 

all of the gels

MGTOP_KIND 

subkind is MGOBJECT_TID, MGGROUP_TID, MGATTRIB_TID

MGMANIFOLD 

subkind is MG0MANIFOLD, MG1MANIFOLD, MG2MANIFOLD, MG3MANIFOLD

MGFSURFACE_KIND 

subkind is MGFSURFACE_TID(MGFace or MGSurface, MG2MANIFOLD that is not

MGShell)

MGGEO_TOPO 

MGGeometry, or MGTopology.

subkind is MGGEOMETRY_TID, MGTOPOLOGY_TID

MGGEO_KIND 

subkind is MGPOINT_TID0, MGCURVE_TID, MGSURFACE_TID

MGLEAF_KIND 

subkind is all of the leaf class MGGEL_TID, that is:

MGPOINT_TID,MGSTRAIGHT_TID,MGELLIPSE_TID,MGLBREP_TID,MGRLBREP_TID, MGSRFCRV_TID,MGTRMCRV_TID,MGCOMPCRV_TID,MGPLANE_TID,MGSPHERE_TID, MGSBREP_TID,MGRSBREP_TID,MGCYLINDER_TID,MGPVERTEX_TID, MGBVERTEX_TID,MGEDGE_TID,MGFACE_TID,MGLOOP_TID,MGSHELL_TID

enum MGGEL_TID

Tyoe id of subclasses of MGGel.

Enumerator:
MGALL_TID 

The mm in 0xmm000000L of the following TID's are subclass id of MGGel.

When a new subclass is necessary to add, this mm will have a new number. all of specified kind of MGGEL_KIND.

MGTOPOLOGY_TID 

Following nn is the manifold dimension, xx is the name id, and m is 0 for cells, and m is 1 for complexes.

0x002mnnxxL is a topology

MGCELL_TID 

is a cell.

MGCOMPLEX_TID 

is a complex.

MGPVERTEX_TID 

MGCELLBASE_TID = 0x0020nnxxL,.

MGLOOP_TID 

MGBOUNDARYND_TID = 0x0021nnxxL,.

MGFSURFACE_TID 

id for MGSurface or MGFace

MGSTL_TID 

id for MGStl

MGAPPEARANCE_TID 

MGGROUP id.

MGAppearance(attributes).

MGLLOBJECTS_TID 

Locally lighted objects.

MGCONTEXT_TID 

MGAttrib id.
